spells.html_content:
Spells

First
/ Favouritism
1 - 3 Range / 2AP

Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature based on the element and the number of charges.
If the caster is Uncharged: summons a controllable Noformo.

If the summons is still alive when the spell is recast, it is teleported to the targeted cell and immobilised.
Teleporting multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies, and depends on its colour.
Required level: :
1|68|134

Normal effects

Consumes the summoning charges.
Teleports to the targeted cell
-100 MP (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1

spells.html_content:
Spells

Protective Balm
/ Fourth
1 - 4 Range / 2AP

Applies the Embalmed state on the targeted ally:
• Applies a shield to the target.
• If it is a summons, this shield is stronger, and it is reapplied at the start of each of its turns.

There can only be one ally in the Embalmed state per team.
If the spell is cast on another ally, its effects are removed from the previous target.

The effects cannot be unbewitched, will not be reapplied to a summons already in the Embalmed state and are transferred when the Noformo transforms.
Required level: :
10|77|144

Normal effects

'Embalmed' state (1 turn)
75% of level to shield (1 turn)
'Embalmed' state (infinite)
150% of level to shield (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Global recast interval
1
Recast interval
1
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Protective Balm
details.description:
Applies the Embalmed state on the targeted ally:
• Applies a shield to the target.
• If it is a summons, this shield is stronger, and it is reapplied at the start of each of its turns.

There can only be one ally in the Embalmed state per team.
If the spell is cast on another ally, its effects are removed from the previous target.

The effects cannot be unbewitched, will not be reapplied to a summons already in the Embalmed state and are transferred when the Noformo transforms.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Whirlwind
/ Plucking
1 - 5 Range / 3AP

Inflicts Water damage on enemies.

On one of the caster's Osamodas summons: teleports entities symmetrically in relation to the summons and inflicts Water damage on enemies in an area of effect around it.
The area of effect depends on the summons's colour:
• Melanic: 1-cell cross.
• Albino: 1-cell square.
• Colourful: 2-cell circle.

Gives a Toacharge (requires a target).
Required level: :
70|134

Normal effects

23 to 26 (Water damage)
Symmetric teleportation

spells.html_content:
Spells

Fourth
/ Protective Balm
1 - 3 Range / 2AP

Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature based on the element and the number of charges.
If the caster is Uncharged: summons a controllable Noformo.

If the summons is still alive when the spell is recast, it is teleported to the targeted cell and immobilised.
Teleporting multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies, and depends on its colour.
Required level: :
120|134

Normal effects

Consumes the summoning charges.
Teleports to the targeted cell

spells.html_content:
Spells

Takeoff
/ Repulsive Fang
1 - 3 Range / 4AP

Switches places with the target.
• If it is an enemy: inflicts Air damage on it.
• If it is one of the caster's Osamodas summons: inflicts Air damage on enemies in a 2-cell circle around the caster and the summons.

The AoE damage is only applied once per casting, and only if the position switch can occur.

Gives a Tofucharge (requires a target).
Gives a second Tofucharge if the target is one of the caster's Osamodas summons.

145

spells.html_content:
Spells

Replacement
/ Animal Blessing
1 - 3 Range / 2AP

Kills one of the caster's Tofus, Gobballs, Toads or Wyrmlings to replace it with a new identical summons, increasing its Vitality for each of the initial target's health point thresholds.

The initial cooldown periods of the new summons's spells are not applied if the summons being replaced was present for at least one turn.
The effects of the Protective Balm, High-Energy Shot, Favouritism, Natural Defence and Relay spells are transferred to the new summons.
Required level: :
170

Normal effects

10 to 100% Vitality (infinite)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
3
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
Yes
Target necessary
Yes

Inflicts Air damage on enemies.

On one of the caster's Osamodas summons: inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels targets in an area of effect around the summons.

• Melanic: 1-cell cross.
• Albino: 1-cell square.
• Colourful: 2-cell circle.
